title: Taric's Pbe Taunt Line towards Pantheon
body:
I am reading the Pbe lines of{{champion:44}}  Taric, the specific taunt towards {{champion:80}} Pantheon  doesn't make 100% sense to me.
His line is "Ah, the Aspect everyone hates." Excluding{{champion:136}}  Aurelion Sol who hates all targonians, and{{champion:89}}  Leona (who may or may not still hold a grudge against pantheon's person) i know of nobody that "hate" Pantheon. Can someone pls clarify this for me.

replies.body: Pantheon is the aspect of War, so he is referring to how everyone hates war and prefers peace.
I imagine it is because he is the Aspect of War. That'd be my best guess.

It's a reference to the community.
Like everyone hates Teemo.

A lot of people complain about Pantheon, that he is overpowered.
It's not a reference to the lore.
